active_by_default.description: Determines whether the state of this power type should be ON by default.
active_by_default.markdownDescription: Determines whether the state of this power type should be ON by default.

key.description: Which active key this power should respond to.
key.markdownDescription: Which active key this power should respond to.

retain_state.description: Determines whether the state of this power type should retain if the condition (if there is any) is no longer fulfilled.
retain_state.markdownDescription: Determines whether the state of this power type should retain if the condition (if there is any) is no longer fulfilled.

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/toggle)

Provides a state that can be toggled with the specified [Key](../data_types/key.md).

Type ID: `origins:toggle`


!!! note

    This power type provides a state that can be toggled with the [Toggle (Entity Action Type)](../entity_action_types/toggle.md) and check the state of with the [Power Active (Entity Condition Type)](../entity_condition_types/power_active.md).
type.markdownDescription:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/toggle)

Provides a state that can be toggled with the specified [Key](../data_types/key.md).

Type ID: `origins:toggle`


!!! note

    This power type provides a state that can be toggled with the [Toggle (Entity Action Type)](../entity_action_types/toggle.md) and check the state of with the [Power Active (Entity Condition Type)](../entity_condition_types/power_active.md).
